documents.document: Now I am stopping people from having their first amendment rights because I replied to @jk_rowling three days ago. Good to know #OhReally
@AFancifulMind @SarahfromNZ and yet Peanut has never been allowed over, I see how that works LOL
@SarahfromNZ WHAT! seriously? @AFancifulMind
@AFancifulMind She is so sweet! Also our boarding kennel arrangements fell through last night so no idea what the heck to do now with P
@AFancifulMind WHEN CAN AUNTY WENDY MEET HER!! omg you never told me she was happening!
@Nil_Joel my notifications are not so blessed because I replied to her 3 days ago and idiot trolls are still on my case lol
For anyone lurking around ready to pounce on my tweet from DAYS ago, I am NOT an American and didn't vote either way. Stop tweeting at me
@hamish_keith @FergusVUP @ElizabethKnoxNZ @guicueilleurs Good dentists like that are as rare as hens teeth
@MichaJohansen :) and you are probably very correct
@hamish_keith She's an immigrant after all
A few people could take this to heart and do themselves a favour :) https://t.co/cmaN75hDV3
@kiwipippa lol trying not to tweet anything to do with that other thing today. Too stressed.
@MarquisedeSark My work here is done for the night then haha
@Cukeyishere @ohthatwelshguy cuteeeee right
@mommayoung123 wedding on Friday, so much not good stuff today argh
Today is not working out well for 2/3rds of our family :/
@dancapper holy crap
@dancapper wait what now
No time for political stuff right now people. My personal life is a tad more important ( a lot more ) Wedding this week! At hairdressers
@PatSmart4 @Pammygirl @excavator_mum I have no time for this nonsense daughter is getting married and I am at hairdressers with dying phone
@MoataTamaira the world has gone insane! :(
@AliCopeman @Pammygirl @excavator_mum not worth replying to :)
@AliCopeman @Pammygirl @excavator_mum Someone trying to make Murica grate againn
@Pammygirl @excavator_mum You mean you haven't already??
@Pammygirl @excavator_mum it was the one that got me called a ct *so proud
@excavator_mum @Pammygirl only another 700 more likes and it will match yesterdays effort haha
@Pammygirl Well she does right ðŸ˜ðŸ˜
@madrunnerz go to their page and it tells you you are blocked
When you realize the reason a tweet is getting so many likes is because Twitter included it in a "moments" story #SagAwards
@KatydidNZ @five15design @paulbrislen He quit and he also isn't dead, also another urban legend
@CabbageMittens So good, Charles definitely wasn't in charge of that exchange
@CabbageMittens I like the part where the guy told Jermaine to give the Maoris back their land bwhaha
@kimbakerwilson @Tenani I know they all end with you might die but whatev's you won't have constipation anymore, so totally worth it
@kimbakerwilson @Tenani the best part is when they reel off the possible side effects to things, WTH
@bex2010 Don't worry I got called all sorts of stuff yesterday because I replied to JK Rowling and they all got their knickers in a twist
@bex2010 the thread haha
@Lukeurmyson Well that's ok then, don't have to send you out to herd the sheep up this evening
Chaci and @AJemaineClement fighting on Twitter is the best thing I have seen today.
@Lukeurmyson At least spell his name right man lol
@sopheakseng_ Hair and make up on point at least, lol
@FoxyLustyGrover @Peytonsnanajo @MollyRingwald I was in a restaurant with her once in LA, true story lol
@MonzagirlNZ He always seems to be whispering to her on the red carpet :)
@FoxyLustyGrover @Peytonsnanajo @MollyRingwald him and Frampton
@amyhickey77 I never said I hated it I just said she looked like a Wicked cast member which she does
@bstnrbstr It's very shiny, I don't "hate" it but a toned down green would have been better
@zrsouthcombe it's very very shiny lol
@MrsGreatnews they let them through the airport!
Nicole looks like one of the Wicked "citizens of Oz" chorus members #sagawards https://t.co/OGyrOV51Fw
@StephanieMarija @justin_lester We Lester's are a good bunch :) * most of us lol
@FoxyLustyGrover @ProckyHorror Awkward lol, remember that parcel I still haven't posted because life went off course. You have backups
@CaseyNeistat The dangling S is a special touch ;) #CanNotBlameAutoCorrect
@Schofe I have tickets in my bag for this, thanks for the reminder and recommedation. Tissues aplenty
@MrsGreatnews @MelBailey Ditto, it is just all so much,so fast and scary as hell
@alkalinekiwi Good morning to you :) Happy Monday
@filmguidenz rogue,vagabond AND bloody good sort ;)
Good morning you rogues and vagabonds, upstanding citizens and bloody good sorts! The rest of you please jog on out of my mentions ðŸ™ƒ
@glibnotion which one? there are tons of them, reporting and blocking and moving on in most cases yes
@glibnotion My notifications this morning, yikes. Scary insight in the mindset of a lot :/
@glibnotion It's still happening, no that response was in this mornings lot. When they have "redneck" in their name, you know it's good haha
When someone asks you if you used a thesaurus to make a tweet using words you LITERALLY made up on the fly haha. Thanks for trying! ;)
@five15design @jamielecomte Happy first day back for the year and good luck at the new school :)
@TonkWoman @L_To @robtreacher omg the notifications this morning, good grief. You know who supporters are actually certifiable half the time
@TonkWoman @L_To @robtreacher 560 likes and still going, guess lots of people disagreed with him lol
@TonkWoman @L_To @robtreacher Which just goes to prove how fantastic you are ;)
@NZ_judester @irisshackleton I wanted to think that was a SNL skit or a parody, it isn't WTF
@L_To @robtreacher on twitter yes lol
@L_To @robtreacher The one I got called today? Yup good times :/ https://t.co/I6o6Z9A8kl
@ohthatwelshguy Does he have a name yet?
@Pammygirl @LegGully @Sportsfreakconz @FoxyLustyGrover well it is a word I hate so don't count on me using it again anytime soon LOL
@Pammygirl @LegGully @Sportsfreakconz @FoxyLustyGrover It's just a word Pam LOL
@bopmafia @LegGully @Sportsfreakconz @FoxyLustyGrover I can read and stuffz eh
@Pammygirl @LegGully @Sportsfreakconz @FoxyLustyGrover The best part was I got called that in a tweet with @jk_rowling so it was actually A+
@Pammygirl @LegGully @Sportsfreakconz @FoxyLustyGrover I was "quoting" ;)
@LegGully @Sportsfreakconz @FoxyLustyGrover I have been using my block button a lot and I am a semi-illiterate cunt so there's that haha
@Sportsfreakconz @LegGully @FoxyLustyGrover Understatement of the year. Crazy crazy day
@LegGully left what?
@CaseyNeistat That isn't a word but I think it should be from now on!
@threadnz Wow that is gorgous!
@threadnz nice, where?? So hot today, I just took the dog for a walk and nearly expired :)
@peecee65 @Jon_Hassall I am staying sequestered inside, just took the dog out earlier and nope lol
@A_J_Hood I am hiding inside, just been out with the dog, omg melting
@yakmoose @AnnaGConnell Next weekend for us, hopefully a bit more excited as it is daughters wedding haha
Peanut and Butter (Bean ) just got vaccinations on a Sunday in our kitchen haha. They are not having a relaxed weekend ;)
@PappaHutten @MaryHadStan @jk_rowling Block and move on, they are starved for attention so don't give them any :)
@jubjubnz Happy birthday to him :)
@CateOwen So much this~
@Chandy229 Well done you haha. Happy Sunday
@vaughndavis @SparkNZ there are issues this morning yes
@bex2010 I love the block button. Honestly so many scary fools out there.
@Pno_nwa I actually consider it an honour to be called a semi-illiterate cunt in the same tweet as @jk_rowling. Bloody scary mindset though
@shadow_nz And we were not even engaging he just jumped in on a reply. What an age to be alive huh!
Been called the C word by an angry you know who supporter this morning. Keep up the good work Twitter lol
@jk_rowling He gets half a point for the right "you're" but it ends there. Moronus astoundiosus
Good morning please tell me something good about today! Unless you have me muted in that case you won't see this,suspect that a lot do
@CabbageMittens @danni_meow @brenakiwi I have had that issue a lot lately, not all @ are showing up for me
@TheAmandaLand I blocked some today,finally caught up on Instagram and FB after a busy few weeks
@kylewadsworth All the time, I just block them eventually, after I see it happening repeatedly
@AndrewKayNZ it is only because it's the rooster year (not every year )
@AndrewKayNZ no it's not a whole chicken with feet and head is GOOD luck
@ChelleHopeBlog He was/is always Quentin to me, I am so glad you appreciate that too :)
